name: The Experience (funnyfumohaha)
description:
in the experience you can experience any experience known to man and even some that are unknown. the experience includes: the experience of falling from a 20 story building, the experience of an out of body experience, the experience of being an alien and interacting with alien species, and several others. there is a "create new experience mode" that lets you make your own experience. the possibilities are endless. there are many secrets yet to be discovered in this game, as well.

CHECK OUT THE REVIEWS

"i think that the experience is a great experience for those looking to have an experience. the experience can be bought on steam for 30 dollars. i gave it four stars out of five on steam. i think that it is almost a must-play, though some experiences could be a bit tedious to get through, as it is almost a must for players to experience them. i'm also very interested in the many secrets that have yet to be discovered in the experience. i believe it will be a revolutionary experience for the human race."

☆☆☆☆ -Jerma985

"Ah! I-It's an interesting premise... but I feel like it could easily get out of hand. A lot of people who play it probably end up just taking out their frustrations on imaginary versions of their bullies. I guess I understand it, but... it's kind of scary, you know?"

☆☆☆☆☆ - Chihiro Fujisaki

"I rate The Experience as a 4/5 stars, I think it is a great concept. I loved the concept of an AI God communicating with humans in a game made by humans. I believe, the experience can truly be a great method to connect with the youth. It is a great way to show them the wonders and realities of the universe. I really enjoyed my time in the game and being able to experience the many things that existed in the universe. It was truly a great experience."

☆☆☆☆- God
